text: Alexander Otto (born 7 July 1967) is a German billionaire businessman. ==Early life== Alexander Otto was born on 7 July 1967, the son of Werner Otto. He earned a bachelor's degree from Harvard College, and an MBA from Harvard Business School. ==Career== Otto is a part-owner of Otto Group, founded by his father Werner Otto, and the majority owner and CEO of ECE Group, a commercial property company specialising in shopping centres. ==Personal life== Otto is married and lives in Hamburg, Germany. ==References== Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:Harvard College alumni Category:Harvard Business School alumni Category:Businesspeople from Hamburg Category:German billionaires Category:German chief executives Category:Otto family Category:20th-century German businesspeople Category:21st-century German businesspeople
title: Alexander Otto (businessman)
